articles.author: Jenny Vrentas
articles.title: N.F.L. Becomes First Major American Sports League to Drop Covid-19 Protocols - The New York Times
articles.description: The league and the players’ union announced they would lift policies that had governed testing, masking and social distancing since March 2020.
articles.content: New case numbers and hospitalizations have fallen sharply from the nationwide peak in January. The N.F.L. said in the memo that it would work with the players union and medical experts to monitor whe… [+1576 chars]

articles.author: Joe Davies
articles.title: Study finds drinking with meals cuts risk of type 2 diabetes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The American study followed more than 300,000 people over 10 years. Previous research has suggested that polyphenols - a compound in the skin of grapes - can reduce blood sugar levels.
articles.content:
You shouldn't feel guilty for having a glass of wine every night so long as you drink it with dinner, like the French.
A study has found enjoying a glass with your meal, rather than on its own, coul… [+6133 chars]
